","usphone":"'kɑnstə'tʊʃən","remMethod":"con + stitut(建立， 放) + ion → 国无法不立 → 宪法","phrases":"chemical constitution: 化学结构；化学组成

","sentences":"The right to speak freely is written into the Constitution of the United States.
^^言论自由的权利被写入美国宪法。^^
","relWords":"adj.
constitutional: 宪法的；本质的；体质上的；保健的

adv.

n.
constitutional: 保健散步；保健运动

constitutionalism: 立宪；立宪主义，立宪制度
constitutionalist: 立宪主义者

vt.
constitute: 组成，构成；建立；任命
constitutionalize: 使宪法化；使具有宪法

","synos":"n.
宪法；体质；章程；构造：formation, fabric, structure, build, make

","sentences":"...the very ordered way in which mathematics and geometry describe nature.

","relWords":"adj.

adv.

n.

geometrician: 几何学者

"},"$:/BeiShiGaoZhong_7/bacteria_101":{"title":"$:/BeiShiGaoZhong_7/bacteria_101","word":"bacteria","tags":"?","caption":"{{||$:/plugins/oflg/fishing-cannedfish-BeiShiGaoZhong_7/Word}}","created":"20220404062718214","transCn":"n. [bacterium的复数]细菌

","sentences":"Chlorine is added to kill bacteria.

","relWords":"adj.

"},"$:/BeiShiGaoZhong_7/radiation_104":{"title":"$:/BeiShiGaoZhong_7/radiation_104","word":"radiation","tags":"?","caption":"{{||$:/plugins/oflg/fishing-cannedfish-BeiShiGaoZhong_7/Word}}","created":"20220404062718214","transCn":"n. 放射；辐射

","sentences":"An accident at the power station could result in large amounts of radiation being released.

","relWords":"adj.

","synos":"n.
[物]辐射；发光；放射物：irradiation, Geigers
"},"$:/BeiShiGaoZhong_7/radium_105":{"title":"$:/BeiShiGaoZhong_7/radium_105","word":"radium","tags":"?","caption":"{{||$:/plugins/oflg/fishing-cannedfish-BeiShiGaoZhong_7/Word}}","created":"20220404062718214","transCn":"n. 镭
","usphone":"'redɪəm","sentences":"Madame Curie discovered radium.
^^居里夫人发现了镭。^^
The radiation radius of the radioactive radium radiator in the stadium is variable.
^^放射性的镭暖气装置的辐射半径在体育场是易变的。^^
Madame Curie was the physicist with expertise in chemistry that, in 1898, discovered the radioactive substances of radium and polonium in Paris, France.
^^居里夫人是一位具有化学专门知识的物理学家。 1898年，她在法国巴黎发现了放射性物质的镭和钋。^^
"},"$:/BeiShiGaoZhong_7/radioactive_106":{"title":"$:/BeiShiGaoZhong_7/radioactive_106","word":"radioactive","tags":"?","caption":"{{||$:/plugins/oflg/fishing-cannedfish-BeiShiGaoZhong_7/Word}}","created":"20220404062718214","transCn":"adj. 放射性的

","sentences":"the problem of how to dispose of radioactive waste

","relWords":"n.
radiation: 辐射；发光；放射物

"},"$:/BeiShiGaoZhong_7/shuttle_107":{"title":"$:/BeiShiGaoZhong_7/shuttle_107","word":"shuttle","tags":"?","caption":"{{||$:/plugins/oflg/fishing-cannedfish-BeiShiGaoZhong_7/Word}}","created":"20220404062718215","transCn":"n. 航天飞机
","usphone":"'ʃʌtl","remMethod":"shut(关) ＋ tle → 封闭的空间 → 航天飞机","phrases":"space shuttle: 航天飞机（往返于地球和太空站之间运载人和物资的）
shuttle bus: 班车（在较短距离之间往返的交通车）；豪华轿车

shuttle kiln: 梭式窑；台车窑
shuttle car: 穿梭式矿车；梭车；往返架车
","sentences":"They stand guard with weapons as the human survivors of the battle are marched onto the shuttle.
^^他们站在一起用武器护卫着战后的人类幸存者鱼贯进入航天飞机。^^
When the humans are all back on Prometheus the last shuttle will be destroyed so no-one can come back.
^^当人类都返回普罗米修斯号后，最后一架航天飞机后将被摧毁，所以没有人能回来。^^
Of course, you could do experiments in the shuttle very well, where you have, again, only air around you.
^^当然，也可以在航天飞机上做实验,除了空气周围什么都没有，效果一样。^^
","synos":"n.
[航]航天飞机；穿梭；[纺]梭子；穿梭班机、公共汽车等：spaceplane
"},"$:/BeiShiGaoZhong_7/crew_108":{"title":"$:/BeiShiGaoZhong_7/crew_108","word":"crew","tags":"?","caption":"{{||$:/plugins/oflg/fishing-cannedfish-BeiShiGaoZhong_7/Word}}","created":"20220404062718215","transCn":"n. 全体机组人员

assisted: 辅助的

n.
assistant: 助手，助理，助教
